property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose one of the following: ► Choose one of your opponent's elements and destroy it. Then you may put the same number of cards as that element's cost from the top of your deck into your graveyard: ► You may shuffle 13 cards from your graveyard and put them on the bottom of your deck. If you do, your opponent chooses 13 cards from their hand and battle zone, shuffles them, and puts them on the bottom of their deck.

property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Light or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent's creatures that cost less than the number of cards in your mana zone are put tapped. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, put all creatures that have power less than this creature into their owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a non-evolution creature from your mana zone. Choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone and your opponent puts it. Then choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures from the battle zone and put them into their owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you cast a Magic Tool spell, after you cast it, instead of putting it into your graveyard, you may put it under this field and draw a card. ■ Ignore any effects that would prevent you from casting Magic Tool spells or Dolszak spells. ■ Gate of Moonless Night 99: At the end of your turn, if there are 4 or more cards under this field, once per game, you may cast a water spell that costs 99 or less from your hand or graveyard for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {W2} (You may pay Water 2 instead of the cost of using this card. If you do, put this card into your shields face up.) ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {GALAXY GO} ■ At the start of your turn, if this card is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. ■ When you put this creature face up into your shield zone, choose a creature that costs 2 or less and return it to its owner's hand. During your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that cost 2 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you would lose the game, if it's your opponent's turn, and you have have one or more darkness cards and one or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may reveal this card from your hand and put it on the bottom of your deck instead. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} Oniend: When you put this creature, if there is a player that has no shields, put the bottom card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a creature that costs 5 or less, you may put it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If your opponent has 4 or more shields than you you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Put a fire creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone. That creature breaks one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Discard your hand, draw 4 cards, then put a card into your mana zone. ■ If it's your turn, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Each player puts all their creatures that cost the same as or more than the number of cards in their mana zones on the bottom of their decks in any order.

If you do, draw 2 cards.

Reveal one to your opponent, add it to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the revealed card is fire or nature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Revolution 2: If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets "shield trigger" when added to your hand from your shield zone. ■ Revolution 0: If you have no shields, this creature gets +10000 power, "speed attacker" and "triple breaker".

property.value: ■ You may summon up to 4 Dolszaks from your hand or graveyard for no cost. ■ Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each creature this creature evolved from. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Super Infinite Graveyard evolution: Put this creature on one or more of your creatures from your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Meteorburn: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That chosen creature gets -9000 power until the end of the turn. Then put a non-evolution creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may destroy 4 of your creatures instead of paying this creature's cost. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, count the number of cards in your graveyard. You may put the same number of cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. ■ When this creature would leave, you may put 6 cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your deck instead.

At the end of that creature's first attack this turn, untap it.
